Package poised

Class PMS

java.lang.Object
poised.PMS
public class PMS extends Object

Project Management System

The Poised program implements an application that is a fully-fledged project management system for a fictional construction company.
Since:
2021-09-22
Author:
Simphiwe Ndaba
